short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 2Learn is a tool to help you learn languages.
short.zh_CN: 2Learn 是一个帮助你学习语言的工具。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will make it easier for you to learn Chinese by providing Chinese phonetics and the most accurate translations in your language.
long.zh_CN: 这款扩展将帮助您更轻松地学习中文，通过提供汉语拼音和最准确的翻译。
